name: Breaking Point (Paele)
description:
During the events of Dragon Age: Origins, the Circle of Magi in Ferelden is attacked by blood mages and demons.
Young templar Cullen Rutherford finds himself in the midst of the chaos, his mind invaded by a desire demon who tries to use his most intimate secrets against him.

This is the second part of my interactive fanfiction set in the Dragon Age universe - you can find the first part here:

https://paele.itch.io/what-keeps-us-apart

It was made with Twine (Harlowe) and takes about 15-20 minutes to play.

Content
The story takes place in Dragon Age: Origins between the mage origin and the return to the Circle of Magi in Ferelden during the attack of Uldred and his followers.
It contains young Cullen Rutherford's crush on a female mage (Amell/Surana), from Cullen's perspective (2nd person POV).
It involves the most traumatic events in Cullen's backstory.
Content/Trigger Warnings for: abuse, halluzinations, nudity, violence, death, mind control
Also: the background color changes multiple times throughout the story which can be a bit sudden.

I do not own any content that is related to Dragon Age - the world and the characters are owned by Bioware/EA.
I only made this for fun and because I love this franchise - I do not intend to make money off of it.
If there is any reason for me to delete this, please let me know.

Quality
English is not my first language - please keep that in mind while reading.
I am also not an experienced writer or game designer whatsoever.
